title: Weather Dashboard
description: A simple weather app that provides a 5-day forecast and saves to local storage.

title: Calorie App
description: A webpage designed for people who are health conscious to track calories and recipes that they eat.

title: README Generator
description: A command-line-interface application that generates a professional and consise README for any repositories. (No live page)

title: Team HTML Generator
description: A command-line interface that automatically generates an HTML file to help keep track of employees info. (No live page)

title: Daily Planner
description: A webpage that tracks your day to day activities and still renders data even when browser is closed.

title: Coding Quiz App
description: A webpage that uses exercises functions along with local storage, set intervals, objects and for loops
